remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener m치s informaci칩n acerca de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], vea la especificaci칩n XML Paper Specification (XPS) disponible para su descarga en [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
